title: kandanai ninaindhu
sahitya:
kandanai ninaindu manam nondEnaDi sakhi kadamba malar aNiyum



kadir kAmattamar vElan tiru 



(kandanai)







anupallavi







mandahAsam purindu manamum kanindu perum Ananda veLLam tanil



amizhndE sukham tanda 



(kandanai)







caraNam







Eninda vElai tanil Enga vaittAn EkAntamAi kaDaikkaN nOkkiyadum



marandAn



kAnakkurattiyuDan kOlak-kalabhamayil mElE shuDar



vIshik-kOlAhalamAi varum 



(kandanai)
